fields.label: Body1
fields.options:
Disability Support Victoria will work closely with other agencies to coordinate the best support for you. This means your informed consent for the sharing of information will be sought and respected in all situations unless:
  • we are obliged by law to disclose your information regardless of consent or otherwise
  • it is unreasonable or impracticable to gain consent or consent has been refused; and
  • the disclosure is reasonably necessary to prevent or lessen a serious threat to the life, health or safety of a person or group of people.

fields.label: body2
fields.options: hereby acknowledge that Disability Support Victoria has advised me of the following:

fields.label: Disability Support Victoria’ Privacy and Confidentiality Policy and Procedure;
my right to access my personal information; and
my right to withdraw my consent at any time.
safety of a person or group of people.
fields.options: I understand that the follow service(s) are recommended and relevant information about me may be forwarded to the agency(s) that provide these services, in order that I receive the best possible service:

fields.label: body5
fields.options: I understand that Disability Support Victoria must comply with relevant privacy laws and I will contact the organisation immediately if I feel that these laws have been breached.

fields.label: body6
fields.options: My worker has discussed with me how and why certain information about me may need to be provided to other service providers.

fields.label: body7
fields.options: I understand the recommendations and I give my permission for the information to be shared with the people or agencies as detailed above.

fields.label: Name of Participant or Authorised Representative
Name of Disability Support Victoria Staff Member
body11
fields.options: Verbal consent should only be used where it is not practicable to obtain written consent.

fields.label: body12
fields.options: I have discussed the proposed referrals with the client or authorized representative and I am satisfied that they understand the proposed uses and disclosures, and have provided their informed consent to these.

fields.label: we are obliged by law to disclose your information regardless of consent or otherwise
it is unreasonable or impracticable to gain consent or consent has been refused; and
the disclosure is reasonably necessary to prevent or lessen a serious threat to the life, health or safety of a person or group of people.
